name: Jungle Fruit Collect
description:
Match and collect 3 or more scrumptious fruit in Jungle Fruit Collect. Create sweet boosters to achieve highest score and win 3 stars with each puzzle. Join and share the fun

Features:
- Journey through more than 200 enchanting levels. Updates come out all the time!
- Never ending fun of match-3 puzzle game
- Slide, swap, switch and match 3 or more same sweet fruit
- You will be able to get a special candy if 4 or more fruit are matched
- Play anywhere anytime: Internet is not a must
- Completely FREE match-3 fruit game
